Actions.Text: AMEND AND RECOMMIT TO HIGHER EDUCATION

Title: Provides that certain persons who are not residents of the state but who have resided in the state for a certain period of time shall be eligible for in-state tuition rates
Summary: Provides that certain persons who are not residents of the state but who have resided in the state for a certain period of time and meet certain criteria shall be eligible for in-state tuition rates.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to tuition rates for certain students who are not residents of the state but who have resided in the state for a certain period of time
